entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Hamilton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:41 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 11:11 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: ENE 54 km/h gust 66 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 8:40 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming west 20 early in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:40 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 8:40 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
